title: 3 and Out - Mahomes/Allen Instant Classic, McVay/Shanahan NFC Championship Showdown, Rodgers Devastating L
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Mahomes/Allen Instant Classic, McVay/Shanahan NFC Championship Showdown, Rodgers Devastating L
description:
John reacts to a weekend of thrilling playoff Divisional Round football, including the instant classic between Mahomes and Allen, and why losing to the Niners is a career low for Aaron Rodgers. Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
